app_name: Groups Control Groups Photo and Video Editing Apps Sharpen Video Enhance Quality
app_description: Sharpen Video is a simple yet powerful video editor for sharpening and enhancing videos. Enhance the quality of your videos by modifying parameters like sharpness saturation exposure gamma brightness contrast and more. You can then save or share the stunning result video. ENHANCE QUALITY: Get beautiful enhanced video results Adjust video parameters like exposure gamma saturation brightness contrast hue and more to get better results Sharpen the video using two smart sharpening filters Preserve the aspect ratio of the original photo video. SMART SHARPENING ENGINE: Keeps the original high quality of the photo or video and only sharpens it Choose between two smart sharpening algorithms. Each algorithm fits different video types. Zoom in to see the result in more detail Fast performance View history of all previously converted videos Save results to Photos or Files Share results with friends using any other social app you like Support for rotating the video 90ยบ 180ยบ 270ยบ All common video formats are supported mp4 mov flv and more BOOST VOLUME: Boost the volume of the video file up to x10 The volume of the result file will be louder regardless to the phone s volume HOW TO USE: 1. Load a video by clicking Open file 2. Apply sharpen effect and adjust color parameters as you wish to enhance the video 3. Watch the result save it to Photos Files and share with friends Note: Do not apply too much sharpening into the video as it may cause unwanted artifacts. Start with a small amount and then increase it as long as the result looks good.
